about: With over 10 years of making kids laugh out loud, Captain Shiver-Me- Timbers 'THE MAGICAL PIRATE' creates 'HAPPY MEMORIES THAT LAST A LIFETIME' The Captain makes sure that each show is tailored to suit the celebration and the Captains blend of high energy MAGIC, SONGS, GAMES, BALLOON TWISTING and...
